translation.en: [woman] The Mega Mitten. The power's not just in your hands.
translation.zh: ‎超级手套 力量不再浮于表面

translation.en: -[video game weapon firing] -[woman] It is your hands.
translation.zh: ‎超级手套 力量不再浮于表面 ‎让你的双手成为力量源泉

translation.en: The Mega Mitten.
For the Nextronico Gaming Entertainment System.
Now you are one with the games.
[man] Coming up next , it's an all-new Saturday Morning All Star Hits!
translation.zh:
‎接下来 为你带来全新的
‎《周六早间大乱秀》

translation.en: with Skip and Treybor!
Whoa! What's up, kids? I'm Skip!
translation.zh: ‎孩子们 你们好呀 我是斯吉普！

translation.en: And I'm Treybor. And we're the new hosts of S.M.A.S.H.!
translation.zh:
‎我是特雷伯
‎我们是大乱秀的新主持！

translation.en: -Saturday… -Morning…
-…All… -…Star…
[both] Hits!
Wait, if it's Saturday, why are we at school?
translation.zh:
‎且慢 如果今天是周六
‎我们为什么会来学校？

translation.en: 'Cause we're finally gonna make school fun by adding TV!
translation.zh: ‎我们总算能让学校变得有趣了 ‎装上电视！

translation.en: If this is school, then I say more detention, please.
translation.zh:
‎如果学校是这样的
‎我肯定求着留校察看的

translation.en: Today's assignment, watch the totally tubular cartoonage we got smashin' at ya!
translation.zh:
‎今天的作业就是
‎观看我们为你准备的超赞动画片！

translation.en: Plus, we got a super sizzlin' sneak peek at the new Johnny Rash movie!
translation.zh:
‎而且 我们还能抢先观看
‎强尼拉什的新电影！

translation.en: Yeah, and I've got a sneak peek at the doggy dance.
-[funky music playing] -Skip, you're doggone crazy.
Bark! Bark! Bark! Bark! Bark!
We'll be right bark-- I mean, back! After an all-new episode of…
translation.zh:
‎我们很快汪来…回来！
‎请先收看新一集

translation.en: [both] Randy! Ah!
♪ Randy ♪
♪ Our best dino pal ♪
♪ He came from long ago But lives with us now ♪
translation.zh: ‎远古而来 如今我们共同生活

translation.en: ♪ Adventures ♪ ♪ Are always in store ♪
♪ He and the gang are ready to explore ♪
♪ But ♪ ♪ It ain't easy being big and green With teeth that look mean ♪
translation.zh: ‎身体大又绿 长着丑大牙 常常遇难题

translation.en: ♪ But he's a cool skater dude ♪
translation.zh: ‎但他擅长滑滑板 友善又有趣

translation.en: ♪ With a good attitude you'll see ♪
translation.zh: ‎但他擅长滑滑板 友善又有趣  ‎你看了就明白 ‎（二手车）

translation.en: ♪ Randy ♪ ♪ The biggest heart in town ♪
♪ So come on, everybody And gather around ♪
♪ And meet Randy ♪
So… th… that's just it then?
I guess so.
Would you want to, like, take some time away from each other and…
and maybe just s-see where we're at?
I don't think so, Randy.
But I… I could be better.
I think this is just how it has to be.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得已经没有商量的余地了

translation.en: I really do love you so much.
Love you too.
[man on radio] Task Force 27 to 200 North Main Street.
translation.zh: ‎第27特遣队 立刻前往北大街200号

translation.en: [man screams on radio] Terry!
[sniffles] I should go.
Yeah.
Oh. Okay.
-[grunts] -[girlfriend] No, just--
My legs always get kinda caught on this thing right here.
-Your tail's hitting the-- -Damn it!
[girlfriend] It's fine. It's fine. It's fine.
-[siren stops] -Well, see ya.
Heather?
No, uh… uh… Michael's upstairs.
Just tell him I'm not here.
[softly] I hate myself.
-What was that? -[music stops]
Nothing.
[whispers] I said I hate myself.
-Okay, I… I can't quite make it out. -[music stops]
But, uh, it sounds like you're saying that you don't like yourself.
translation.zh: ‎但你好像在说你不喜欢自己

translation.en: No.
[whispering] I didn't say I don't like myself.
-I said I hate myself. -[melancholic music starts, then stops]
Now it sounds like you're sort of, uh, quietly correcting me,
and I'm just very concerned about you, Randy.
All right, Dr. Kottrellberg, seems like you fixed me.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 科特博格医生
‎你好像把我治好了

translation.en: -Really? -[softly] No.
All right, well, just take care of yourself.
I forgot to tell you one thing, Dr. K, that I wish I was extinct.
translation.zh:
‎有件事我忘了告诉你 科医生
‎我要是灭绝了就好了

translation.en: Hey, Dr. Kottrellberg, can Randy come out and hang with us?
translation.zh:
‎嘿 科特博格医生
‎兰迪能出来和我们玩吗？

translation.en: Uh, I'm afraid he's… he's not feeling well, Michael.
translation.zh: ‎他现在不太舒服呢 迈克

translation.en: Dr. K, is Randy around?
Maybe try next week, Shawna.
Is Randy free?
Not gonna happen, Rocko.
[kids clamoring] Randy! Randy! Come on!
Yeah, Randy, come on.
Let's live our lives!
We're only young once! Come on, let's play!
translation.zh: ‎时不待我啊！快出来和我们玩吧！

translation.en: The whole gang's here!
[chanting] Randy! Randy! Randy! Randy!
I told you guys, he's still the same old Randy.
translation.zh: ‎我都说了 他还是老样子

translation.en: [Michael] Oh, buddy.
[Skip, Treybor] Saturday Morning All Star Hits! will return after these messages.
translation.zh:
‎以下简讯后
‎《周六早间大乱秀》马上回来

translation.en: ♪ Rogo! ♪
[girl] Little crafts… -[child] Can you please give me a cat? -[boy] No!
translation.zh:
‎-小猫咪
‎-可以给我一只猫咪吗？

translation.en: Can't you read the sign?
Can't you read the sign?
You're in big trouble, young man!
Oh no. Guess I better book it.
translation.zh: ‎不要啊 我认“书” 溜了溜了

translation.en: Let's just watch more Randy.
Wait, so she was just like, "We're not doing this anymore"?
translation.zh: ‎等下 她就说了句“我们结束吧”？

translation.en: I guess it was sort of like, we got our whole lives ahead of us.
And 'cause I, like, live in a museum basement,
translation.zh: ‎而且我还住在博物馆的地下室

translation.en: and I don't kiss her as much anymore,
translation.zh: ‎我亲她的次数也越来越少了

translation.en: and I get drunk a lot, I'm maybe not a good partner.
translation.zh: ‎我还酗酒 算不上个好伴侣

translation.en: -What does she mean? -That's dumb.
Pshh. Girls are weird, dude.
By my calculations, she doesn't deserve you.
translation.zh: ‎根据我的计算 她配不上你

translation.en: [chuckles] Thanks, Digit.
Well, we're psyched to have you back, man.
Thanks, guys.
I mean, I… I guess she's sort of right.
I've never really pushed myself.
Maybe 'cause I'm, like, a dinosaur.
I mean, I left the only world I knew,
got zapped into the future where I'm the last of my kind,
translation.zh: ‎被带到了未来 我的同类都灭绝了

translation.en: then I find out I'm not even the last of my kind!
translation.zh: ‎接着我又发现我的同类并没有灭绝

translation.en: You guys should be wearing helmets.
-Shut up, Newton! -Go away, Newton!
translation.zh:
‎-闭嘴 纽顿！
‎-走开 纽顿！

translation.en: I'll seriously kick your butt, dude!
translation.zh: ‎我真的要揍你了 臭小子！

translation.en: Plus, I never told you guys,
but I've never really been comfortable with my body.
translation.zh: ‎其实我一直不喜欢我的身形

translation.en: Whoa, a house party!
You need a pal, don't ya?
Yeah, I guess.
Rad!
[drunkenly] Just admit it, human beings got lucky.
translation.zh: ‎承认吧 人类就是走狗屎运

translation.en: Dinosaurs should've stayed on the planet.
translation.zh: ‎恐龙才应该在这个星球上存活下来

translation.en: I mean, can a human do this?
[in a high-pitched voice] I said, can a human do this?
Hey, Randy, take it easy, man.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 兰迪 冷静一点 兄弟

translation.en: I'm cool, dude.
-Whoops. -Holy crap!
-Fire! -[kids coughing]
[boy 1] Fire, man!
[boy 2] Oh my God, fire!
[boy 3] Run! Fire!
This is kind of crazy, right?
-You're still drinking. -What?
The fire is almost gone.
There shouldn't have been a fire in the first place, Randy.
Oh, here we go. Please, tell me how much of a screw-up I am.
translation.zh: ‎又来了 烦请你告诉我我有多烂

translation.en: Let's hear about my "bad hygiene,"
'cause when I say I'm brushing my teeth,
I'm actually just splashing the water around
and thinking about playing video games.
The point is, someone could've gotten seriously hurt here, Randy.
translation.zh:
‎重点是
‎有人可能因为火灾受重伤 兰迪

translation.en: Yeah, but they didn't. Maybe you should lighten up.
translation.zh:
‎是没错 但是又没有发生
‎别紧张兮兮的

translation.en: Hey, Randy, I think it's time for you to get out of here.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 兰迪 你该离开这里

translation.en: Newton? I see what's happening here.
Cool. Gotcha.
Bye, Heather. I hope I never see you again.
translation.zh: ‎拜了 海瑟 但愿永不相见

translation.en: -[sirens wailing in the distance] -And just so you know, I was lying.
translation.zh: ‎再说一句 刚刚是骗你的

translation.en: You suck at dancing.
You can't take that blanket with you!
-You okay? -Oh yeah. I'm…
I'm fine. It's just… [huffs] …he's so frustrating.
translation.zh: ‎我没事 只是他太让人头疼了

translation.en: I know. He's such a great dinosaur, but--
translation.zh: ‎我知道 他是只好恐龙 但是…

translation.en: Can be a jerk who spends so much time lounging…
translation.zh: ‎有时候也很混球 还动不动就躺沙发

translation.en: …you'd think he was supermodel Sasha Sinclair
translation.zh: ‎你可能还以为是超模萨沙辛克莱尔

translation.en: sunbathing on an exotic beach.
translation.zh: ‎在充满异国风情的沙滩上晒日光浴

translation.en: There you go, little buddy.
-[inhaling] -[fireman] I don't think he'll make it.
It's like he could do anything he wanted if he just got out of his own way.
translation.zh: ‎他要是不自断前程 其实无所不能

translation.en: [gasps] I made it!
Like, seriously, he could go to school for doing drum machines.
translation.zh: ‎说真的 他可以去学打电子鼓

translation.en: -If I could weigh in here-- -Go home, Newton!
translation.zh:
‎-能让我说两句…
‎-滚回家 纽顿！

translation.en: I guess… [scoffs] …Randy's just got to make his own choices.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得只能让兰迪自己做选择了

translation.en: That's what hurts me most.
Just standing on the sidelines, watching him mess up his whole life.
translation.zh:
‎我只能站在一旁
‎眼睁睁看着他毁掉自己

translation.en: But I'm not his mom and I'm not his shrink,
translation.zh: ‎但我不是他妈 也不是他的心理医生

translation.en: and maybe I shouldn't be his girlfriend.
-[ambulance siren wailing] -You should make sure your friend's okay.
You're a good person, Heather.
[Skip, Treybor] Saturday Morning All Star Hits! will return after these messages.
translation.zh:
‎以下简讯后
‎《周六早间大乱秀》马上回来

translation.en: [man] The battle for Strongar rages in your hands.
The War Boars will destroy your puny Peace Prisms. [snorts]
translation.zh:
‎好战野猪分分钟就能击碎
‎你那弱不禁风的和平棱镜

translation.en: -Back off, Hammer Hog. -[man] It's Tigor, with whip attack tail.
translation.zh:
‎-退后 锤头猪
‎-我叫虎哥 尾巴抽人生疼

translation.en: My hatedar is picking up trouble.
-[man] Drogg, with real-feeling tongue. -It's so wet!
translation.zh: ‎狗哥 舌头非常真实 ‎舌头好湿！

translation.en: [man] Kickaroo's fingernails really grow!
And don't forget Guinja.
Fill him with water, freeze him overnight, and he makes real ice!
translation.zh: ‎把它装满水 冰箱冻一夜 能出冰哦！

translation.en: Hey, Skip, do you think there's intelligent life out there?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 斯吉普 你觉得有智慧生命体吗？

translation.en: I don't think there's intelligent life in here.
Hey, that was rude.
Now check out Create-A-Crittles.
[narrator] Once upon a time,
a struggling young artist by the name of David Gnubbens
translation.zh:
‎有一位很努力的年轻艺术家
‎叫大卫纳笨斯

translation.en: stumbled upon magical creatures.
They taught him the true potential of creativity.
translation.zh: ‎他们教会了他真正的创造潜力

translation.en: The Create-A-Crittles.
[narrator] Little did David know,
he started a friendship that could never end.
translation.zh: ‎他开始了一段无法结束的友谊

translation.en: The world just isn't ready for the Create-A-Crittles.
translation.zh: ‎世界还没有进步到能接纳创意渣渣

translation.en: So David must keep them a secret from everyone, especially his family.
translation.zh:
‎所以大卫不能让别人知道他们
‎尤其是他的家人

translation.en: Oh no, please not tonight. No, not tonight.
translation.zh: ‎拜托 今晚别闹啊 千万别在今晚闹

translation.en: Okay, great.
-Oh, hi. Is Fifi asleep? -Yep.
Are you prepared
for your big corporate project meeting in the morning?
translation.zh: ‎明天早上的公司重要项目会议了吗？

translation.en: -Yep. -I know you'll close the deal.
Yeah, I just gotta do one last thing and take out the trash.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 我还有件事没做 然后就去扔垃圾

translation.en: -Don't wait up for me. -[suspenseful music playing]
It's Create-A-Crittle time--
[grunts] Crittles? Hello?
David, we thought you bailed on us.
translation.zh: ‎大卫 我们还以为你抛弃我们了

translation.en: Sorry I'm late, Brusho. I've just been really busy today.
translation.zh:
‎对不起 我来迟了 刷刷
‎我今晚一直很忙

translation.en: Trying to snip us out of your life?
translation.zh: ‎想把我们从你的生命中剪去吗？

translation.en: Of course not, Scizzi.
Look, I love you guys. You give my life so much--
translation.zh: ‎听我说 我爱你们 你们让我的生命…

translation.en: Color?
[laughs] Argie B, you said it.
So here we are, my three best friends.
translation.zh: ‎你们真是我的三个最好的朋友

translation.en: -[purple bear struggling] -Oh, right. Pasto.
[Pasto, muffled] My eyes must've fallen out!
Pasto, come here. Let me help you out with that.
Thank you, David.
Ugh. Oh no. Look at this. I ruined your project.
translation.zh: ‎糟了 怎么办 我毁掉了你们的作品

translation.en: No, you didn't ruin it. You fixed it.
translation.zh: ‎怎么会呢？ 是你修好了它

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah! And you mixed up all the colors!
translation.zh: ‎是啊！所有的颜色都调得恰到好处！

translation.en: [chuckles] This is why I love you guys. You're so creative.
translation.zh: ‎我真的好喜欢你们 你们太有创意了

translation.en: You aren't afraid to make a big mess.
Because that's where you find the masterpiece.
[David] So, what do you call this mess? I mean, um, masterpiece?
translation.zh:
‎你们怎么称呼这团东西？
‎我是说 这件佳作

translation.en: This is Paste-or, the giant robot from my solo show that opens tomorrow.
translation.zh:
‎这是粘大师
‎是我明天个人秀要用到的巨型机器人

translation.en: -What? -You remember.
You're the guest of honor.
Yeah, you can count on me, Pasto. I'll be there.
translation.zh: ‎嗯嗯 包在我身上 粘粘 我会去的

translation.en: I'm counting on you. Look, and here's your ticket.
translation.zh: ‎我就指望你了 给你门票

translation.en: It's very big for a ticket.
-Wow! I love these bubble letters. -Yeah. Brusho did the bubble letters.
translation.zh: ‎哇！我好喜欢这些泡泡字体 ‎那是刷刷写的

translation.en: Oh, well, they're really cool.
I know, but honestly, I did have a little inspiration.
translation.zh: ‎我知道 不过说实话 我有个小想法

translation.en: Here. Have some Crittle Glitter. [giggles]
Oh, uh, not tonight, 'cause tomorrow morning I got that big corporate project meeting.
translation.zh:
‎今晚不行呢
‎明天早上我有公司重要项目会议

translation.en: Oh, you're going through with that corporate project?
'Cause I thought you knew that if you did that,
translation.zh: ‎我以为你知道 如果你去做项目

translation.en: we'd never talk to you again.
translation.zh: ‎我们就再也不会和你说话了

translation.en: [laughs] I'm kidding. That corporate project sounds cool.
translation.zh: ‎逗你的 公司项目听起来很厉害哦

translation.en: Hey, stay here, have one cream soda, then we'll let you get to bed.
translation.zh:
‎在这儿喝杯奶油苏打水
‎然后我们就让你去睡觉

translation.en: [chuckles] I knew you guys would understand. One cream soda, please.
translation.zh:
‎我就知道你们能理解
‎一杯奶油苏打水 谢谢

translation.en: -[cans click open] -We're totally good.
[Argie B] Oh my gosh, guys!
You wanna see my dance?
David! David. David. David.
We've invited you to this big corporate project meeting
translation.zh:
‎我们诚邀你参加这个
‎公司重要项目会议

translation.en: based on the strength of your portfolio.
It's very creative.
Yeah. Creative. [chuckles] You know what they say,
translation.zh: ‎是的 很有创意 ‎俗话说得好

translation.en: you gotta make a big mess to find the masterpiece.
-[executive 1] Make a big mess? -David Gnubbens!
This corporation has rules.
Oh, no, no, no. It's, uh, it's just a… a metaphor.
I'm not making a… a literal mess. No, no. [chuckles nervously] I'll be good.
translation.zh: ‎我不是真的瞎搞 真的 我会守规矩的

translation.en: Very well, David, very well.
Now, we're going to take a chance on you and allow you to work
translation.zh: ‎我们想给你一个机会 让你试试

translation.en: on the crown jewel of our empire, the Bumpy B Subs logo.
translation.zh: ‎设计集团的明珠 奔波B的标识

translation.en: Oh wow, I've always loved the Bumpy's logo.
translation.zh: ‎哇喔 我一直都很喜欢奔波的标识

translation.en: It's so simple.
[gasps] He thinks it looks simple?
[executive 2] This logo took decades to perfect.
When we tried a version with serif, our stock dropped 700%.
translation.zh:
‎我们用有衬线字体的时候
‎股价跌了7倍

translation.en: The last designer who worked on it killed himself!
translation.zh: ‎最后一个设计这个标识的人自杀了！

translation.en: So, David, are you willing to dedicate your life to the Bumpy B?
translation.zh: ‎那么 大卫 你愿意为字母B献身吗？

translation.en: -Yes, sir. -Well, then prove it…
translation.zh:
‎-我愿意 先生
‎-证明给我们看…

translation.en: by eating this bowl of barf.
[chuckles nervously] Is this a joke?
Ah. Very well. Nice to know you. Kickoff over. Have a nice day.
translation.zh: ‎很好 很高兴认识你 滚吧 日安

translation.en: No, no, no! I'll do it! I'll eat it! I'll eat the barf. I'll do it!
translation.zh:
‎-别 我吃！我吃！
‎-再见 ‎我吃！我吃就是了！

translation.en: -[chuckles] David! David, we're kidding! -[executives laughing]
-Oh golly. Oh yeah. -You passed the test.
We're not monsters.
We just love the Bumpy B more than anything.
Oh, no, no. [laughs]
Me too.
Oh, you guys really got me. I thought that was real barf.
translation.zh:
‎你们真的吓死我了
‎我以为那真的是一碗呕吐物

translation.en: Well, the barf is real.
Oh, and it has been sitting out for some time.
Flanagan, please throw this in the rubbish and prepare David's contract.
translation.zh: ‎佛兰纳根 麻烦你把它倒掉 ‎再准备一下大卫的合同

translation.en: -[upbeat music playing] -[wife, on phone] Hello?
translation.zh:
‎-有人吗？
‎-亲爱的 我有好消息！

translation.en: [David] Honey, I've got great news! I'm designing the new Bumpy B!
translation.zh:
‎-有人吗？
‎-亲爱的 我有好消息！ ‎我要设计奔波B的新标识了！

translation.en: -[wife] Brilliant! -This calls for champagne!
Oh, this is the life. Hey, hon, how's it going in there?
translation.zh: ‎这才是人生啊 亲爱的 怎么样了？

translation.en: [wife] Be right out!
[in sensual voice] Look, the strap on my outfit broke.
Do you have any paste?
I'll paste it back on and give you a show.
translation.zh: ‎我把它粘好 然后给你表演一段

translation.en: Paste. Show. [gasps]
Pasto's show.
Oh no, um, uh… You know what?
I think I have to go outside and, uh, uh, take out the trash.
[in sensual voice] Now, David, don't you think the trash can wait?
translation.zh: ‎大卫 扔垃圾可以等一等吧？

translation.en: Trust me, I can compete with a smelly bag of trash.
translation.zh: ‎相信我 我可比臭垃圾香

translation.en: You know what, actually?
I think I'm gonna like not taking out the trash.
Now where's that paste?
[sniffles] Well, I guess David hates me.
David doesn't hate you. It was that evil corporate project meeting.
translation.zh:
‎大卫不讨厌你
‎他只是被公司项目会议拖住了

translation.en: It's turned him corporate!
Hey, uh, I don't want to stand. Can I take David's seat?
translation.zh: ‎我不想站着 可以坐大卫的座位吗？

translation.en: No, no, no! He still might come.
You know the rules. No late entry. Now, Pasto, show us what you got.
translation.zh:
‎你知道规矩 不准迟到
‎粘粘 快开始你的表演吧

translation.en: All right, Paste-or and I welcome you to the greatest… [voice breaks]
translation.zh: ‎好吧 欢迎来看粘大师和我的超赞

translation.en: …funnest… [sobs]
…coolest show ever! [sobbing]
[sobbing] The Pasto Show!
Hey, Treybor, I bet if I gave you a ten-second head start,
translation.zh: ‎嘿 特雷伯 我敢打赌 我让你十秒

translation.en: you couldn't beat me in a race.
Yeah, right. I've always been the faster twin.
translation.zh:
‎拉倒吧 我一直是双胞胎里
‎跑得快的那个

translation.en: You're on.
Okay. On your mark, get set, go!
translation.zh: ‎好 各就各位 预备 跑！

translation.en: I want my mommy! [grunts]
One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten!
Hey, Treyb, I'm actually kinda jealous. You never told me you were taking a trip.
translation.zh:
‎嘿 特雷伯 我其实有点嫉妒你
‎你居然偷偷去旅行

translation.en: Ow. That wasn't cool, man.
But you know what is cool?
This super S.M.A.S.H.!-clusive movie preview
from your favorite star, Johnny Rash!
translation.zh: ‎由你最喜欢的明星强尼拉什带来！

translation.en: Check it out.
Hey, I'm Johnny Rash on the set of my new movie,
translation.zh:
‎嘿 我是强尼拉什
‎这里是我的新电影的片场

translation.en: and you've never seen or heard me quite like this before.
translation.zh: ‎这次的我是你们从未见过或听过的

translation.en: -[girls] We love you, Johnny. [smooch] -Ah, shut up. Check it out.
translation.zh: ‎我们爱你 强尼 ‎别说啦 请欣赏

translation.en: [narrator] Tyler's new in town,
and he's about to learn that high school
isn't all it's cracked up to be.
-We have a new student. His name is Tyler. -[class laughing]
translation.zh: ‎我们有位新同学 他叫泰勒

translation.en: [narrator] But there's something a little different about Tyler.
He's a Rollerblader.
My skates!
[narrator] And when you Rollerblade at Hamilton High,
translation.zh: ‎当你在汉密尔顿高中溜旱冰

translation.en: you don't exactly fit in.
Here. Take this.
A skateboard?
[narrator] But skateboarding isn't Tyler's only problem.
translation.zh: ‎但是滑板并不是泰勒遇到的唯一难题

translation.en: -[Tyler screams] -[narrator] He's got a royally big secret.
translation.zh: ‎因为他还有一个惊天大秘密

translation.en: Lauren, I have to be honest about something.
translation.zh: ‎劳伦 有件事我要和你坦白

translation.en: Yeah, tell me anything.
As you can see, I am…
not a fan of pizza.
[narrator] But his luck is about to change when Tyler finds…
translation.zh: ‎但泰勒即将转运 因为他发现了

translation.en: [narrator] …one million dollars.
Eat my dust, Jacob!
translation.zh: ‎跟在我屁股后面跑吧 雅克布！

translation.en: [narrator] But it's going to take a lot more than money…
You used to be different.
[narrator] …to win over the girl of Tyler's dreams.
Now you're like everyone else.
Come on, Lauren. Clearly I'm different than everyone else.
translation.zh:
‎拜托 劳伦 你一眼就能看出
‎我和其他人不一样

translation.en: Look at me. I'm…
inside a sports car.
[narrator] And his world's about to turn upside down when he finds out…
translation.zh:
‎他的生活即将发生翻天覆地的变化
‎当他发现…

translation.en: I'm on the Skyhawks?
Hey, Tyler, when the game's on the line, I'm passing you the rock.
translation.zh:
‎嘿 泰勒 一会儿比赛开始
‎我就把球传给你

translation.en: Mo Jones knows my name?
[narrator] But before he steps on the court, he's gotta go back in time…
translation.zh: ‎但在他上场之前 先得穿越回以前…

translation.en: Okay, now you dudes look weird.
-[narrator] …and then go forward in time. -Whoa! Huh?
Hey, teach, my report's gonna be a little
different.
[playing rock music] ♪ That's why class is dismissed ♪
Hey, Martinez, not bad.
Here, you know what to do with this.
translation.zh: ‎这个给你 你知道该怎么做

translation.en: He's…
-[grunts] -…amazing.
-[mellow music playing] -[narrator] Matt Hartwell, Lottie Wolfe,
translation.zh: ‎马特哈特威尔 洛迪沃夫 ‎（洛迪沃夫）

translation.en: the Spider Brothers, and Johnny Rash as…
translation.zh: ‎蜘蛛兄弟 以及强尼拉什扮演

translation.en: the Video Game Master.
You forgot to mention one thing.
I'm…
a ninth-grader.
Whoa, that movie looks zuzzy zazz.
-What? -What's wrong?
Still want your mommy?
[in slow motion voice] I want my mommy!
I was just trying to make you laugh.
No, you weren't.
Yeah, I was.
All right, we got some great cartoons next week,
translation.zh: ‎下周我们将带来精彩的动画片

translation.en: including a brand-new Strongimals!
Yeah, and I'm on it.
-You're what? -Yup.
The Skipster's doing a voice.
I wonder what I'll look like all cartoonified.
translation.zh: ‎不知道我的卡通形象会是什么样呢

translation.en: Wow, that's, um…
Good… Good for you, Skip. That's great.
translation.zh: ‎恭喜你啊 斯吉普 真了不起

translation.en: Until next week, kids.
translation.zh: ‎孩子们 下周见啦 记住

translation.en: Remember, you're never too old to yell,
translation.zh: ‎孩子们 下周见啦 记住 ‎不管多大 你都可以喊“我要妈妈！”

translation.en: "I want my mommy!" [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎不管多大 你都可以喊“我要妈妈！”
